title: Did the CEO of Camping World tell Trump's supporters not to shop in his stores?
subtitle: Marcus Limones did not target President Trump's supporters as such, but he appears to have made comments to the supporters of Trump's response to the events in Charlottesville.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In August 2017, Marcus Limones, Executive Director of the World Camp, told supporters of President Donald Trump not to shop in his shops.
